articles.author: MICHAEL R. SISAK, JENNIFER PELTZ, ERIC TUCKER, JAKE OFFENHARTZ
articles.title: Trump hush money trial: Star witness Michael Cohen set to testify - The Associated Press
articles.description: The star prosecution witness in Donald Trump’s hush money trial is set to take the stand with testimony that could help shape the outcome of the first criminal case against an American president. Michael Cohen, Trump’s former lawyer and personal fixer, is by …
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) The star prosecution witness in Donald Trumps hush money trial is set to take the stand Monday with testimony that could help shape the outcome of the first criminal case against an Ame… [+5415 chars]
